text: jo us rasool ka anusaran karenge, jo ummee nabee[1] hain, jin (ke aagaman) ka ullekh ve apane paas tauraat tatha injeel mein paate hain; jo sadaachaar ka aadesh denge aur duraachaar se rokenge, unake lie svachchh cheezon ko halaal (vaidh) tatha malin cheezon ko haraam (avaidh) karenge, unase unake bojh utaar denge tatha un bandhanon ko khol denge, jinamen ve jakade hue honge. atah jo log aapapar eemaan laaye, aapaka samarthan kiya, aapakee sahaayata kee tatha us prakaash (quraan) ka anusaran kiya, jo aapake saath utaara gaya, to vahee saphal honge
